question: What per cent of the capital expenditure target of CPSEs should be met before December 2020?
explanation:
A review of performance of central public sector enterprises (CPSEs) was made the Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman.
During the review, she insisted that 75 per cent of the capital expenditure target of the CPSEs should be met by them by the end of third quarter of 2020, in order to help the economy to revive faster.
